column1: '''''Other Hands'' 27''' is an issue of ''[[Other Hands]]''
column2: a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''. The theme of the issue is "Magic in the Third Age".

column1: *Magic in the Third Age - (Martin Burke) [a comprehensive overview of how magic works; 18 pgs]
*Taurinafanto - ([[Graham Staplehurst]]) [epic ready-to-run adventure set in TA 1635 Rhovanion; 18 pgs]
*Mithril Feature: Enchanters of Mirkwood - (Chris Seeman) [2 pgs]
